bib.title: Distributed service-oriented architecture for information extraction system" Semanta"
bib.author: Jastrzebski, Lukasz and Piasecki, Maciej and Strzelecki, Grzegorz and Wilkosz, Krzysztof
bib.abstract: Our objective is to provide a flexible, scalable, distributed architecture that assures a high performance for information extraction (IE) systems working in Internet. The architecture is based on both the general paradigm of the service-oriented architecture, client-server approach and strong separation of concerns between storage and processing components. An experimental IE system, named Semanta, utilising the proposed architecture is also presented. In the following document, we describe five main Semanta services, which are
bib.booktitle: 5th International Conference on Intelligent Systems Design and Applications (ISDA'05)
